site.title: A puppy!
site.description: Yes! I was a beautifull puppy too, fluffy, crazy and full of curiosity. I had a kind of hard childhood, bad people makes me suffer, but one day, Anna appears in my life, and she showed me the real side of love.
site.quote: Until one has loved an animal a part of one's soul remains unawakened.

site.title: When I knows the meaning of
site.subtitle: Love!
site.description: Finally I found a home full of love. Anna's love gives me a new opportunity to believe in life. She cares of me, and each second of her life is a present for me.
site.quote: The average dog is a nicer person than the average person.

site.title: She's Anna
site.subtitle: My Human Soulmate!
site.description: Every small thing in life has a reason to be. Anna found me, love me, She and I were life parterns, support each other in bad times, we had an unique connection, pure, our hearts were linked by the love.
site.quote: An animal's eyes have the power to speak a great language.

site.title: Kisses
site.subtitle: and full of love
site.description: I lived hard, really hard times. I gave support to Anna when her world breaks down, and she did everything humanly possible to keep me with her, suffer with my and my illness, I'll never forget her love. I will be FOREVER with her.
site.quote: I've seen a look in dogs eyes, a quickly vanishing look of amazed contempt, and I'm convinced that dogs think, humans are nuts.

gallery.title: At the park!
gallery.description: Everyday is a good day to go to the park with Anna!.

gallery.title: My Brother!
gallery.description: He is scooty, my little brother! I'm really happy to go out with him.

gallery.title: At the beach!
gallery.description: I love to go out with Anna and enjoy the sunny days.

gallery.title: Getting elegant
gallery.description: Sometimes we look like a royalty people. Elegance is a must!

gallery.title: I love to use trimmings on my head
gallery.description: A beautiful lady always must wear accessories.

gallery.title: My Birthday!
gallery.description: A hat, food and Anna's love. That's all I need.

gallery.title: Tired!
gallery.description: We are tired of run! always fun!.

gallery.title: I feel sleepy
gallery.description: My beloved couch, I love to sleep there.

gallery.title: Always together
gallery.description: Soulmates looking at the same direction, we will be connected forerver.

gallery.title: We are inclusive family
gallery.description: My brothers and I, sharing love.

gallery.title: The Ocean
gallery.description: I love to go to the ocean with Anna, some fresh water for me please!.

gallery.title: Snow snow, sweet snow
gallery.description: I have to confess, I love the snow.

gallery.title: I love winter
gallery.description: I said I LOVE the snow!
